control.visible: Control.IsVisible(501) + Container.OnNext + ![[Skin.HasSetting(noflow) + ![Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(noflowtv) + [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)]]]

Control.IsVisible(501) + Container.OnPrevious + ![[Skin.HasSetting(noflow) + ![Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(noflowtv) + [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)]]]

Container.Content(episodes) | [Container.Content(tvshows) + ![Skin.HasSetting(tvposterinfopane) | Skin.HasSetting(tvthumbsinfopane)]] | Container.Content(seasons) | [Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(fanartinfopane) + Control.IsVisible(501)] | [Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(fanartinfopane503) + Control.IsVisible(503)] | [Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(fanartinfopane504) + Control.IsVisible(504)] | Container.Content(musicvideos)

animation.condition: [Container.Content(movies) + [[Skin.HasSetting(extrathumbs) + Control.IsVisible(501)] | [Skin.HasSetting(extrathumbs503) + Control.IsVisible(503)] | [Skin.HasSetting(extrathumbs504) + Control.IsVisible(504)]]] | [Container.Content(movies) + [[Skin.HasSetting(posterinfopane) + Control.IsVisible(501)] | [Skin.HasSetting(posterinfopane503) + Control.IsVisible(503)] | [Skin.HasSetting(posterinfopane504) + Control.IsVisible(504)]]] | [Container.Content(tvshows) + Skin.HasSetting(tvposterinfopane)]

[Container.Content(movies) + [[Skin.HasSetting(extrathumbs) + Control.IsVisible(501)] | [Skin.HasSetting(extrathumbs503) + Control.IsVisible(503)] | [Skin.HasSetting(extrathumbs504) + Control.IsVisible(504)]]] | [Container.Content(movies) + [[Skin.HasSetting(posterinfopane) + Control.IsVisible(501)] | [Skin.HasSetting(posterinfopane503) + Control.IsVisible(503)] | [Skin.HasSetting(posterinfopane504) + Control.IsVisible(504)]]] | [Container.Content(tvshows) + Skin.HasSetting(tvposterinfopane)]
